actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing a welcoming ceremony for the 1980 United States Winter Olympics Torch Relay Team on the Capitol Grounds.

summary.text: Honors the 1980 Winter Olympics Torch Relay Team by a welcoming ceremony on the steps of the Capitol Building. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the support, encouragement and best wishes of the American people accompany the U.S. Olympic Team to the 1980 Winter Olympic Games.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing a welcoming ceremony for the 1980 United States Winter Olympics Torch Relay Team on the Capitol Grounds.
